titles.title: Health Protection Amendment of 2009
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding health care.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - Health Protection Amendment of 2009 - Declares that health care, including care to prevent and treat illness, is the right of all U.S. citizens and necessary to ensure the strength of the nation.
